# ChunkDefinitions.GetMapping method

Gets the chunk class type for a chunk type.

```csharp
public Type? GetMapping(ChunkType chunkType)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| chunkType | The chunk type to map to a chunk class type. |

## Return Value

The chunk class type, or `null` if a mapping is not found.
